item.title: Brooklyn's Luft Coffee
item.description:
Brooklyn's Luft Coffee

About five years ago, Blair Smith's twice-a-day coffee pitstop at NYC's Kaffe 1668 led to him striking up a friendship with barista Justin Rodriguez behind the counter. Smith then met mobile developer Aaron Sutula in a coffee seminar held by an espresso machine company. "I took a day off of work to go," remembers Sutula.

item.title: Moleskine's Comprehensive Smart Writing Set
item.description:
Moleskine's Comprehensive Smart Writing Set

At a conference on productivity-which touched on everything from the importance of tech-free alone time to the educational and emotional benefits of writing by hand (as outlined in a series of studies on the subject)- Moleskine unveiled their latest analog-to-digital wonder.
